resources.string: It is said \'cleanliness is next to Godliness\'. Cleanliness determine our quality of life. It is at both the levels-personal hygiene and the surroundings. Everyone should wear clean clothes, drink clean water and wash himself properly by timely bathing. This practice will protect us from falling ill. We should keep our houses clean and sweep the littlest dirt into dustbins. Keeping surroundings clean is equally important. No garbage should be allowed placed at proper places. Litters and garbage should be dumped into them. If every individual pays attention to cleanliness whole world will be a cleaner place to live in, then we will be healthier, happier and richer.
No news available, please reopen\nthe app or check after some time
